data.title: Insurance Recruiters: All titles
data.meta_description: The James Allen Companies is a leading team of insurance recruiters. Working all level and titles with carriers, brokerages, and agencies across the country

A More Personal Approach To Meeting Our Client Needs

A More Personal Approach

To Meeting Our Client Needs

Relationships Matter

You Can Count On Us!

The most trusted name in insurance industry staffing

Experienced, dependable and nationally acclaimed, The James Allen Companies specializes in insurance industry recruitment. We fill positions in all departments for personnel in all positions and levels of expertise. Our client-focused Contingency Search format guarantees positive results: You don’t pay unless you’re satisfied!

Contingency Search Specialists -- Assuring Your Satisfaction

Executive Search

Addressing executive, senior-level or middle-management recruitment takes experience, exceptional network connections and staffing expertise.

Key hire Search

Using our proprietary custom search strategy we begin by identifying and locating top candidates most likely to be an asset and make a strong contribution to your organization.

Temporary

Our temporary staffing solutions include last-minute emergency coverage or department staff supplementation to support peak production or expansion efforts.

Temporary To Full Time

We will custom recruit, screen and place your next quality employee from temporary to hire. Give us your required skills and experience parameters.

What others are saying about us

Amy has been a delight to work with on behalf of RTW. Inc’s recruiting needs. She is very professional, detail oriented, considerate and knows exactly what type of candidates we are looking for and provides excellent service. She is always a step ahead in the process! I definitely recommend Amy both if you are looking for new talent acquisition for your company or as a Human Resources Professional.

Nicole Baker, PHR, CHHC, AADP

Jeff Gipson helped me at a difficult juncture of my employment search even though that help could not possibly benefit him. I felt his generosity was noteworthy and would recommend Jeff because of this quality.

John Zimmerman

Amy is an excellent recruiter! She has strong communication and customer service skills which goes a long way!

Nicole Anacleto-Tosca

“I have worked with Jeff both on the employer and candidate side. Jeff’s rare authenticity, unimpeachable character, and ability to truly listen to the business or personal problem at hand separates him from the pack as a recruiter and as an enduring friend. Not only does he provide impeccable service, he is honestly and openly concerned with creating real connections and lasting friendships. Any company and any candidate should feel lucky to be working with him.”

Matt Frazier

Amy is extremely organized and dependable. Her attention to detail insures positive results in any endeavor. She is trustworthy and personable and a delight to work with.

Emily Sikes Blattel

Jeff is a true leader in his field. His honest and ethical approach to the Staffing and Placement Business is unsurpassed. He consistently looks for the win/win in every business transaction. Having known Jeff for many years, I can attest that he is successful in the Staffing and Placement Industry because of his skills, experience, and sincere desire to help his clients and candidates. You will not find a better Search Firm in his space.

Dave Fingers - President & COO

I am pleased to recommend Amy Simpson as a quality recruiter in the insurance industry. She is dedicated and responsive and she takes a personal interest in learning about the customer’s needs. She earns the respect of her clients by listening and responding. Her customer service skills are outstanding.

Ann Walker, SPHR,SHRM-SCP,HCS,RCC™,AINS,AIS

Jeff is extremely passionate about business growth and doing the right thing. While at Bradford & Galt, Jeff had tremendous success as a recruiter, manager and eventually as the VP opening new branches and growing the existing branches. You will be very pleased to work with Jeff in any capacity, I certainly was.

Steve Ecker

I’ve partnered with Amy on a number of job searches. She has an uncanny ability to dissect the role, understand our needs and consistently identify the best talent possible. She is responsive, creative, professional and above all an amazing, talented Insurance Recruiter.

Shanerical Keith

Amy is hands down the best executive recruiter I’ve had the pleasure to work with. She reached out to me for a senior position in my field, convinced me to move forward and consider the opportunity and, when the time came, helped close the process to the best possible outcome. She found a perfect match for both myself and the organization and I recommend her without any reservation – whether you are a firm looking to hire or a a candidate.

Dr. Michel Leonard

Amy was incredibly helpful and an absolute pleasure to work with from our very first interaction all the way through the process of interviewing and getting hired for my new job. She is professional, punctual, and followed through with everything we discussed. I sincerely appreciate her assistance in finding a position she felt I would be a great fit for and walking me through the entire process. She clearly has a talent for matching up candidates with employers that are a good fit for each other. I highly recommend working with her if given the opportunity.

Laura Niblack

I have had the pleasure of working with Amy Simpson as a candidate for an employment opportunity. With over 20 years of professional work experience, I have worked with many recruiters but none as outstanding as Amy. She is one of the rare finds you will come across that genuinely listens to both the employer and candidate to ensure the best long-term fit. From the candidate's perspective, I have to say that Amy Simpson is a superior recruiter from the perspective of preparing you for the interview(s) and understanding the corporate culture you will be working in. She cares about your long-term experience and the potential to grow with the organization. I highly recommend employers looking for the right employee to reach out to her and trust her skills. You will not be disappointed and your business will only benefit from the level of expertise and talent she delivers to you in the form of extraordinary team members.

Christina Tierney
